content.description: Perfect deep water soloing in beautiful Arkansas. To access the climb, you may downclimb easier sections of the reservoir face, or start by jumping into the water above the big overhang.
content.location: Climb up the largest overhang on crimps and slopers, until at the base of the roof. Cut feet and launch for the jug on top of the overhang. Finish pulling the roof with either a heal hook or use that campus strength diligently honed in the gym. Top out, or have a celebratory jump into the reservoir to finish.

content.description: The climb is in Greers Ferry Lake, and access is through the Dam Site Recreation area. Access is typically free to enter on evening weekdays, otherwise $5 per vehicle to enter the Dam Site Recreation Area all other times.  Great climb to try in the evening, the sun sets over the lake. (arkansas.com/accommodationsâ€¦)  Unfortunately no pets allowed.
